name: International Conference on Social Sciences in the Modern Era
content: Change is the only constant in the field of social sciences. Like a living organism, it evolves, adapts, and discovers new opportunities. For those working in the field, it is essential to actively stay up to date on the new developments in the field. The international conference on social sciences offers that exact opportunity. In addition to the program packed full with insights in the form of lectures and poster presentations, the social sciences conference features a variety of networking events and a 1-day guided tour of the host city. Join your peers from around the world â€“ fellow scholars, researchers, graduate and post-graduate students, and members of non-profit and government sectors. Together, you can help shape the discourse in the field of social sciences: what are the trends? What are the most urgent challenges that require immediate solutions? What are the long-term projects and expectations in the field? We look forward to welcoming you in Manchester (or virtually) this October!
